    B

    Bill - Record Class in Model
     
    Bill(int, int, String, String, int, double) - Constructor for record class Model.Bill
    Creates an instance of a Bill record class.
    BillController - Class in PresentationLayer
    Controller class for displaying bills in the BillView table Fetches all bills using BillDAO and shows them using reflection
    BillController(BillView) - Constructor for class PresentationLayer.BillController
    Constructs the controller and loads the bills
    BillDAO - Class in DataAccess
    Data Access Object for handling operations related to the Bill entity Bills are stored in the 'log' table and are immutable Only insert and read operations are allowed
    BillDAO() - Constructor for class DataAccess.BillDAO
     
    billsButton - Variable in class PresentationLayer.MainView
     
    billTable - Variable in class PresentationLayer.BillView
     
    BillView - Class in PresentationLayer
    GUI class for viewing all generated bills Displays a table of all bills stored in the database
    BillView() - Constructor for class PresentationLayer.BillView
    Constructs the Billview GUI window
